alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 8:39PM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Saint Johns River at Astor has risen from Minor to Moderate Flood Stage... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .A combination of slow drainage into the river from rainfall over the basin earlier this week, and impeding of the downstream northward flow of the river around the times of high tide has pushed the St. Johns River at Astor back up into Moderate Flood Stage of 3.0 feet this evening. The river is forecast to hover at or near Moderate Flood Stage Saturday and Sunday, and then rise slightly above the Moderate Flood threshold through early next week, cresting at around 3.1 feet Monday and Tuesday. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1030 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River near Astor. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, Moderate Flood | Water approaches or may enter lowest homes on or near Wildhog Road and nearby canals. Flooding reaches the parking lot of the Juno Trail Apartments. Flooding on portions of Alligator Road and Holiday Road. Lowest lying yards along Blue Creek are flooded. Roads at Astor Landing Campground and Lake Dexter Boat Ramp begin to flood. Water enters lower homes closest to the river on McPherson Lane. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 3.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 2.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM EDT Friday was 3.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 3.1 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed St Johns River Astor 2.3 3.0 Fri 7 pm 3.0 3.0 3.1 3.1 3.0 &&
